Sequence Alignment.name: BLAST
Sequence Alignment.description: Basic local alignment search tool, provided by NCBI.

Sequence Alignment.name: LALIGN
Sequence Alignment.description: Online free tool for finding local alignment between two sequences (provided in stipulated input format, viz. plain text without header line, Swiss-Prot ID, TrEMBL ID, EMBL ID, EST ID etc).

Sequence Alignment.name: ClustalW
Sequence Alignment.description: A very popular site for pairwise and multiple sequence alignment. . It runs in Windows, Linux/Unix and Mac operating systems.
